column4:
Two quick Q's pleas don't dis about topics, just need to find help. 1. Any CVS gurus with SourceForge experience available? 2. Windows .txt file does not break a line with "\n" or "
" so what is the correct code?
check file encoding. what windows app are you using to open .txt
is there a way to turn off panning on a second monitor
Using PHP, but "\r\n" does not a new line make in .txt files.
